sourcesContent:
import Link from 'next/link' import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import useSWR from 'swr' const Header = () => { const router = useRouter() const fetcher = (url) => fetch(url).then((r) => r.json()) const { data: user, mutate: mutateUser } = useSWR('/api/user', fetcher) console.log({user}) const logout = async () => { const res = await fetch('/api/logout') if (res.ok) { mutateUser(null) router.push('/login') } } return (
Home
{user ? ( <>
{user.email}
) : ( <>
Login
Signup
)}
) } export default Header
